title: 5 injured in shooting at north Charlotte Cook-Out
content:
CHARLOTTE - A shooting early Sunday morning at the Cook-Out on Sunset Road in north Charlotte sent five people to the hospital, according to the Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police Department.
All injuries are non-life-threatening.
Police said an overnight altercation at the restaurant led to the shooting in the parking lot. No suspects have been arrested.
Eyewitness News has reached out to Cook-Out corporate for a statement, but no one has responded yet.
